summary: Issue requesting verification that all Tokio join handlers are properly joined to prevent panics from being silently ignored. This was applicable to a previous version of the SDK but is no longer relevant due to an SDK rewrite.
userImpact: Ensures that panics in background tasks are properly surfaced rather than being silently ignored during SDK operations.
rootCause: Tokio join handlers may not have been fully joined, potentially allowing panics to be ignored in previous SDK versions.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version that is no longer applicable.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
